name: Jigsaw With Friends
description:
Assemble jigsaw puzzle alone or with your friends, choose your image of liking and have fun!

You need graphics card that supports Open GL 4.6 to run this game.

1) Extract the file from Rar.

2)Enjoy!

To host online game:

1) Port-forward port 3333.

2) Open new/saved game.

3) Open settings and click on "Start Multiplayer".

4) Send your IP to other players.

The other players need to copy and paste the IP in the textbox below "Join Game" button in main menu and then click the "Join Game" button.
